first_para: David Hugh Malone, author of The Debt Generation, is also director of television documentaries on philosophy, science and religion originally broadcast in the United Kingdom by the BBC and Channel 4. David is also the Green Party's prospective parliamentary candidate for Scarborough and Whitby in the 2015 general election. He currently lives in Scarborough, North Yorkshire.

full.extract: David Hugh Malone, author of The Debt Generation, is also director of television documentaries on philosophy, science and religion originally broadcast in the United Kingdom by the BBC and Channel 4. David is also the Green Party's prospective parliamentary candidate for Scarborough and Whitby in the 2015 general election. He currently lives in Scarborough, North Yorkshire.
full.title: David Malone (independent filmmaker)
